ingredients.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Leftover Mushroom Risotto","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"100 gram mature cheese","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"1/2 cup white flour","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"1-2 eggs","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Breadcrumbs","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Frying oil","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Parmesan Cheese","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"list-item"}],"nodeType":"unordered-list"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Tip: Roughly a single serving of risotto is enough for two people due to the flour, eggs, breadcrumbs, and frying oil.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

text.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Heat enough ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"oil","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" for frying in a deep pot.\nGrate 100 g ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"mature cheese","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", and mix it with the left over ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"risotto","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" 4 parts to 1 in a large bowl.\nSet up 3 dipping bowls in the following order: ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"flour","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", beaten ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"egg","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"breadcrumbs","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Form the risotto cheese mix into balls, 3-4cm in diameter.\nDip the balls in each bowl covering the entire surface from flour, to egg, to breadcrumbs.\nPlace the balls on a plate ready for frying.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Fry the balls 5-6 at a time in the frying oil. They are ready when golden brown, and the cheese is melted on the inside.\nServe with ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"truffle mayo","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":", and grated ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"parmesan","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" cheese.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Tip: The oil is ready if a small amount of bread begins to fry immediately when touching the oil.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}
